meanings.definition: People who do not practice a polytheistic or nature-based religion.
meanings.sent1: Nonpagans in our community celebrate different holidays.
meanings.sent2: The nonpagans in the village attended the local church.
meanings.sent3: The nonpagans were puzzled by the rituals of the pagan festival.
meanings.sent4: To the nonpagans, the idea of multiple gods seemed like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The nonpagans stood out in the crowd with their unique beliefs.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of people who do not follow a pagan religion.
meanings.sent1: She admired the nonpagans' peaceful way of life.
meanings.sent2: The nonpagans' traditions were different from those of the pagans.
meanings.sent3: The nonpagans' garden was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpagan friends always respected her beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The nonpagans' music echoed through the valley.
